formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'TXTCIDName' =-
[Synopsis] Lookup caller name from TXT record
[Description] TXTCIDName(<CallerIDNumber>[|options]): Looks up a Caller Name via DNS and sets the variable 'TXTCIDNAME'. TXTCIDName will either be blank or return the value found in the TXT record in DNS. The option string may contain the following character: 'j' -- jump to n+101 priority if the lookup fails This application sets the following channel variable upon completion: TXTCIDNAMESTATUS The status of the lookup as a text string, one of SUCCESS | FAILED

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
